attributes.review: i wanted to download the app because i just wanted to see what was going on with our orange but as soon as i got into the app....my dog got hurt and i thought it was curse because of orange and i got scared so i was about to delete it but then my whole phone crashed like how does that happen. after i turned it back on i tried to delete it again and my sister literally burned my house down like now i gotta buy a whole house. i am disappointed on oranges app it was disgusting to see the corn hair shutting my phone down, never downloading the app again👋🏼.
attributes.title: bad

attributes.review: I downloaded the app to get updates on the upcoming events surrounding the Trump campaign and I was thoroughly disappointed about how poorly ran the app was and after trying again and again to make the app work it continuously under preformed. This app is honestly just terrible
attributes.title: Truly disappointed

attributes.review: I was expecting this app to be non-scary since that was what was promoted but the images were just terrifying. I’m convinced the app was trying to also steal my information since it demanded to have my phone number. For the safety of those who plan to download this app I recommend you just don’t!
attributes.title: Very unsettling

attributes.review: Um I’m extremely disappointed in this, I was hoping to see my beautiful orange president but right when I opened it up I realized that there wasn’t any beauty, and that it was just an egotistical, racist, white supremisist, douche bag, selfish, idiotic, anti feminist, low life loser, and I am glad I deleted it right away because that was disgusting... come on Apple I expected better

I was promised the entire cast of either Hannibal or The Order, specifically Thomas Elms, to show up on my roof sun-tanning, but no, instead of that I got a COMPLETELY different vibe. I’m all for supporting our ✨lovely✨ president, (may he Rest In Peace) but this is TOO MUCH! All I want is to have a muscular man clad in leather sweep me off my feet but instead I get plans for a little dead Cheeto rally.
attributes.title: I wanted Thomas Elms

attributes.review: Hi, I really wanted to love this app. I am an avid Trump supporter and for the president to create an app that continually crashes within moments of opening it, is just not okay. I have contacted customer support on multiple occasions and they have all advised me to close the app and open it back up. Nothing has worked. Therefore, I give this app 1 star.
attributes.title: Faulty

attributes.review: I hate this app! It’s really awful, it’s promising things that it does not deliver and has a terrible set up. It is absolute trash and should not be allowed on any store where you can buy or download an app. This is soo horrible I want to throw up! 🤢 It’s such bad quality. Ewww, I never want to look at it again.
attributes.title: This app is horrible 🤮🤮

attributes.review: ✨Very horrible app made me sick so I decided to inject Lysol the Lysol had a very bad side effect on me. I started to turn orange like our daddy trump 😷🙈. Please do not get this app or else you will get viruses my phone started playing gooba 😔also made my phone very slow like our daddy President. ✨✨❤️💕. ᗷᕼᑌᗴᔕᒍYᗴᔕ 🤷sometimes✨i🙁don't😢wanna😱be😼happy🧚don't✋hold😇it🤪against😈me🙆
attributes.title: Very bad!!!!!❤️

attributes.review: This app crashed as soon as I tried to access it. Once I finally did get in, the outline for his plans to be re-elected were completely uninformative and did not make much sense. I would not rely on this app to give you accurate information of his viewpoints upon re-election.
attributes.title: Very slow, anti-informative

attributes.review: I got this app hoping to hear some real news and ideas from trump but the app started crashing every five minutes! I’m pretty sure my cellphone got HACKED from having this app and I had to factory reset it just for my phone to work again! I lost EVERYTHING! It’s such a bad app and it’s ruined my life
attributes.title: Crashes, hot phone, hackers
